summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingBYOMA De-puff and Brightening Eye Gel is a targeted eye treatment that helps calm and brighten dark circles and puffiness.
details: DetailsBenefitsLightweight gel stimulates and awakens skin instantlyPuffiness is reduced for better, brighter under-eyesTri-Ceramide Complex, Triple Hyaluronic Acid + Vitamin C calm and brightenAlcohol & fragrance-freeRecyclable bottlesClincally proven to instantly cool under eyes by up to 10 degreesClinically proven to immediately hydrate skin up to 100%Clinically proven to reduce undereye-bagsNational Eczema Association ApprovedFeaturesFormulated with Korean chemistsâ€™ expertise to deliver noticeable results instantly and over timeKey IngredientsTri-Ceramide Complex works to safeguard and support the skin barrierVitamin C to brighten and reduce inflammationItem 2611683How To UseMassage 1-2 pumps in circular motions around eye area, then gently tap into skin. Use AM + PM for dark circles and puffy eyes.Precautions: Eye irritant.IngredientsWater, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Cetearyl Olivate , Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Sorbitan Olivate, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Carbomer, Ceramide NP, Cholesterol, Phytosphingosine, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Stearic Acid, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Oleic Acid, Sorbitan Isostearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, PVM/MA Copolymer, Menthyl Lactate , Ethyl Menthane Carboxamide, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Sodium Phytate, Methyl Diisopropyl Propionamide, Lactic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Tromethamine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Tocopherol.
how_to_use: Massage 1-2 pumps in circular motions around eye area, then gently tap into skin. Use AM + PM for dark circles and puffy eyes.Precautions: Eye irritant.

reviews.headline: This actually helps!
reviews.comments: Ive tried others this is the best one ive tried!

reviews.headline: Personally love this!!
reviews.comments: Ive been using this since December of 2024 and its mafe a huge difference! I always felt like my eyes made me look so tired and since then ever since ive used this my eyes make me look so much more awake. Whever i dont use product ive noticed my eyes start looking tired again. Hope this helps!!!

reviews.headline: Don't Waste Your Money
reviews.comments: Honestly this did nothing for my dark circles after switching from the Inky List brightening cream. If you want something that really is effective and works quickly get the Cocokind one! I cant say enough great things about that eye cream. I love all of Byoma's other products I use but this is just a miss for me.

reviews.headline: Caffeine works pretty good
reviews.comments: Love how the eye cream helps diffuse the puffiness  and that it helps soothe the dark circles and that it works really well that plenty of my dark circles went down

reviews.headline: preventative eye cream
reviews.comments: this was a nice eye cream, but didn't make any difference to my dark circles. that said, it didn't break me out or cause those little white bumpies under my eyes and it lasted about 7 months with daily use!! I just need more treatment from my eye cream versus prevention which is what I'd classify this product as. great price for a nice cream though!

reviews.headline: BYOMA Brightening Eye Gel
reviews.comments: I am not a huge fan of this eye gel. You could definitely find something else that's better. I saw no change in my skin, and it made my eyelids/undereyes feel greasy. I would not recommend.

reviews.headline: Did not work for me
reviews.comments: I got this after on recommendation. I have been using consistently, daily, I have not seen any difference since starting. I have dark, puffy under eye areas and unfortunately this did not work on me.

reviews.headline: Please change the packaging!!!
reviews.comments: I like it, it's a thick gel that absorbs quickly and makes skin smoother. You can apply more on top. However, the packaging is so bad!!! It's so big and the lid doesn't click on easily. Kinda annoying

reviews.headline: Burnnnsss
reviews.comments: I pit it on and cooled for a little but them it burned and stung me. It does depuff, but it burns.

reviews.headline: not for me
reviews.comments: I bought this because Nina Pool recommended it. I have been using it for a couple days and my under eyes are so sore and have bumps on my under eyes. I wanted this to work, sadly my skin hates it.

reviews.headline: Hydrating and cooling
reviews.comments:
I bought this eye cream after using the ordinary, good molecules, clarins, and beautybio. This is the only eye cream that moisturized my eyes without irritating them. I ran out and and i am scrambling to place an order. Yes, quite a bit comes out for each pump but i need that amount to repair my dryness. What really sealed the deal was when my daughter mentioned she no longer saw creases under my eyes anymore when i wore makeup.
I have oily skin in my tzone and slightly oily skin in my cheeks. My under eyes were very dry until I began using this product.

reviews.headline: Great for all over the face
reviews.comments: Used it under my eyes and didnt really see a difference but now I use it all over and it sits so well under my makeup.

reviews.headline: Works wonder for my swollen eyes
reviews.comments: I bought this because allergy season is really messing with my eyes and they are swollen in combination with antihistamines this gel is helping to combat the worst. It also relieves redness and adds enough moisture without looking greasy. I'm only using it in the morning but very satisfied with the results

reviews.headline: Brightening and depuff
reviews.comments: I like this eye gel ill rate it a 7/10 when i put it on at night on my undereyes i wake up the next morning and they are brighter and less puffy. It also has a minty cooling feeling which is nice but i had to get used to it at first.

reviews.headline: Pass
reviews.comments: I love Byoma but going pass on this eye gel. Dispenses too much product and caused extreme irritation that I threw it out

reviews.headline: Sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I wanted to give it a try and did but regret it! My skin isnt super sensitive but it gave me red blemishes under my eyes and red bumps. Do not recommend.

reviews.headline: I would buy again!
reviews.comments: Very hydrating under the eyes, however, not seeing too much brightening or de-puffing. If this was called a hydrating gel, it would get five stars.

reviews.headline: Like it
reviews.comments: It feels fresh, haven't seen much improvement with my puffy eyes but it feels good

reviews.headline: Beautiful Packaging, Great Price, but Needs Improvement
reviews.comments: The price for this eye cream indicates its performance level. I know I purchased this eye cream for less than $25.00. Rule of thumb, you should never be depending solely on eye cream to get rid of the appearance of dark circles - the magic potion is sleep! But if you want an eye cream that will perform noticeable results, you should expect to spend anything over $50 to $75. I did not see any results from this eye cream - it just was a lubricant barrier. I work a stressful job primarily on computers and aim to get 7-8 hours of sleep per night, so those also play a factor. I did read the most positive helpful review. I have sensitive combo skin. I did not report feeling any sting from this product. On the other hand, the most negative critical review was very eye opening for me (no pun intended!) because I did not realize you could even break apart the product. I write my product reviews when I'm done with a product. I thought I had used all this eye cream a month ago. When I opened this eye cream, I still had ONE THIRD of the product left! The straw didn't even reach the bottom! I hope this isn't some sneaky marketing tactic by Byoma. Hats off to whoever made the bottle, but it's ineffective. Life hack, if you aren't getting anything out of the pump, bang the can on a hard surface and it will come out. It's also possible to fit a Q tip in there.

reviews.headline: great!!
reviews.comments: This stuff is amazing! this depuffs my underyes so well!

media.caption: Works out well that undereye cream works 10 outta 10

faceoff_positive.comments:
I used this on a day my eyes were swollen from an allergic reaction, so it had a lot to overcome, and I do believe there was visible improvement. 

It did sting a bit, but that was more of a its working feeling rather than pain. I do not love how the container looks so much bigger than the contents. It is a cute pink color, though, and I find it pleasing to look at on my dresser.
faceoff_positive.headline: Stings a bit seems to improve eyes

faceoff_negative.comments: I was excited to try this new eye gel and was intrigued by the pump application until I tried to use it. The packaging was pretty but had a huge flaw!  The container arrived broken and I tried for 10 min to make it work! I had to tear it completely apart to use the eye gel and When I finally was able to access the product it was just ok! It made my under eye area feel dry and I didn't notice much difference in the depuffing of my bags! Quality control needs to ensure that the bottles work correctly cause a customer doesn't wanna spend money on a damaged product!!
faceoff_negative.headline: Not impressed
